content.body: As far as syntax bikeshedding outside of the formal meeting goes, probably don't wanna forget it impacts `import()` too?
content.formatted_body: As far as syntax bikeshedding outside of the formal meeting goes, probably don't wanna forget it impacts import() too?

content.body: And interesting point on CSS, I didn't realize those would forbid further imports. Not sure if that's enough as they also take URLs, but maybe. (It would have been so nice if import specifiers were just URLs. We could have made `js:specifier` work. Oh well.)
content.formatted_body: And interesting point on CSS, I didn't realize those would forbid further imports. Not sure if that's enough as they also take URLs, but maybe. (It would have been so nice if import specifiers were just URLs. We could have made js:specifier work. Oh well.)
